[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢---------------------------------------------------------------ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢

[i][b]Director Ken Russell's vibrant, hyperactive version of the Who's classic rock opera tells the story of a boy (Roger Daltrey) rendered deaf, dumb, and blind by the sight of his father's murder. His psychedelic journey through a maze of abusive relatives and strange cures eventually leads to enlightenment and sainthood. The film is based on guitarist Pete Townshend's stage opera, and features a star-studded cast that includes Ann-Margret, Oliver Reed, Elton John, Jack Nicholson, and Tina Turner.
[/b][/i]
